participant_1.name: Alex Mercer
participant_1.personality: Introverted and innovative, often lost in thought but passionate about technology.
participant_1.background: i've an allergy to water. i am working on a building a robot to be my body double. i am a recluse. i helped design the game starcraft.

participant_2.name: Jordan Lee
participant_2.personality: Enthusiastic and sociable, loves connecting with others through shared interests.
participant_2.background: i love to play board games. my parents were also teachers. my favorite band is up and i got to see them in concert once. for vacation i enjoy time at the beach.

content.text: Hey, are you here? What's up?
